paragraphs: BARDS of Tamriel! PEOPLE of Solitude!
The Bards College's most revered musical instruments have been restored to their rightful place! Tonight we take them off their pedestals to hold a grand salskap in honor of their return.
Our traditional bard party includes the premiere performance of "An Adventurer's Triumph."
Join us for a night of song and feasting that Solitude will never forget!
